name: TouchDownZ2D
description:
It's about Damien (who you're going to be playing as) an american football player, trying to score a touchdown from one side of the pitch and avoid the zombies at all cost. The reason they're after you is because you're not carrying a football, no, you're carrying brains. Damien is told to carry out the brains from one side of the pitch to another and score touchdowns. 

Controls - WASD or arrow keys to move around.
